data.name: Among Stars and Robots Demo
data.detailed_description: Among Stars and Robots is a puzzle game where you control the robot Cubot with visual programming. Cubot needs to navigate the tricky terrain with its (somewhat limited) processing power. Use the commands at your disposal to design a loop of instructions that will help Cubot find its way to the exit!
data.about_the_game: Among Stars and Robots is a puzzle game where you control the robot Cubot with visual programming. Cubot needs to navigate the tricky terrain with its (somewhat limited) processing power. Use the commands at your disposal to design a loop of instructions that will help Cubot find its way to the exit!
data.short_description: Lead Cubot through over 50 challenging puzzles using the commands at your disposal without getting stuck in a loop!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.15+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
